caption:
The photograph captures a serene and atmospheric night scene at a natural lakeside setting. It prominently features salt formations, which are large, rugged, and detailed, showing multiple layers and textures. These salt formations are jutting out into a body of water, their intricate structures highlighted against the darker surroundings. The water beside these formations captures light reflections, which add a shimmering quality to the scene.

In the background, a mountain range under twilight conditions can be observed, adding depth and a hint of mystery to the composition. Above the mountain, a full moon hangs bright and clear in the dark blue sky, casting a gentle light over the landscape and contributing to the tranquil and slightly eerie atmosphere of the setting.

Overall, the photograph offers a vivid portrayal of natural geological wonders under moonlight, creating a compelling interplay between light, shadow, and natural forms.
title: Tufa "towers", porous rock formations, created by the heavy saline content of Mono Lake.
